entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IL2026 and IL3050 code fixers generate invalid code #100474
  • STJ: JsonNode.ReplaceWith used with an array will result in a node that identifies as array but is not a JsonArray node #100470
  • [API Proposal]: JsonNode.ReplaceWith #100468
  • The type initializer sometimes doesn't execute for an empty struct #100466

Closed

  • [API Proposal]:Count method #100467

PullRequests

Created

  • Force OptRepeat, 2 iterations. Enable in Release. #100473
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • PEReader throws exception when using PEStreamOptions.PrefetchMetadata for some assemblies #100472
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Add OptRepeat phase start/end indications #100471
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix non-deterministic trigger of struct type initializers #100469
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [RISC-V] Fix intermittent failures due to unalignment access #100431
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

Updated

  • Cleanup NativeAOT math helpers #100375
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add type-specialized vectorized hash table container #100386
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix allocation of empty array in the frozen heap for collectible types #100444
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • FixOptRepeat and force repeating #100447
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable FEATURE_PERFMAP on OSX, and update perfjitdump.cpp to work on OSX #99986
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add Task.WhenEach to process tasks as they complete #100316
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Convert OAVariant interop to managed #100176
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove non INPLACE_RUNTIME NativeAOT paths, cleanup exceptions #100379
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][HybridGlobalization] Fix ShortDatePattern year format to be "yyyy" #99908
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Globalization, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Add span detection in Enumerable.First(predicate) #100405
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • records with pattern: strange behavior #72822
  • `where` is not suggested when adding the first type constraint to a local function #72821
    Backlog

PullRequests

Updated

  • Support ref struct implementing interfaces in `foreach` and `using` statements #72810
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Reapply "Simplify updating the primary workspace without passing in a version #72808
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: mapaction #54859
  • Extend Blazor for source generator to perform service injection instead of built-in reflection #54857
  • There is no guidance for multiple Identity actions with a transaction #54855
  • Cannot submit the form because no form on the page currently has that name. #54854

Closed

  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #54856
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #54851

PullRequests

Created

  • Display Footer so you can add in Grand Total of all Columns and so on #54858
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Convert to 1es templates #54853
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [BUG] Detecting iOS Code Signing Authority does not respect PropertyGroup conditions in Visual Studio 17.10.0 Preview 2.0 / .NET MAUI 9.0 #21546
  • Build fails due to problems with Android manifest generation. #21545
  • NU1103: Unable to find a stable package runtime.linux-arm.Microsoft.DotNet.ILCompiler with version (>= 8.0.3) #21544
  • [MISSING DEPRECATION] Non-firing function overrides like OnMeasure and OnAppearing should be marked as deprecated #21543
  • [BUG] On Android (when also connected to Mac), resizetizer does not often run on time on first rebuild / empty obj directory, leading to processing of AndroidManifest failing (Visual Studio 17.10.0 Preview 2 / .NET 9.0 Preview 2.0) #21542

Closed

  • [iOS] Focus on Entry is craching the default app #21541

PullRequests

Created

  • Android pan fixes #21547
    community ✨

Updated

  • Add Apple Privacy Manifest to new project template #21350
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/templates 📄
  • [iOS] Implemented PrefersHomeIndicatorAutoHidden, PrefersStatusBarHidden and PreferredStatusBarUpdateAnimation Platform Specifics #20069
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area/platform
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Increased Memory Usage with Lazy Loading in EF Core 8 #33444
  • JSON path is not properly formatted. #33443
  • Aggregated state for entries containing JSON columns. #33442
  • LazyLoader.Load remove ConcurrentDictionary _isLoading #33441

Closed

  • Ef core does not considering "DeleteBehavior.NoAction" while migration generation #33437
  • Identity insert fails when the target table is called `File`. #33429
  • Upgrade Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore 8.0.3 Error #33431
  • Update a null value on JSON column not working #33392
  • Infer inline collection element type mappings from each other (and onto the projection) #33438
    9.0.0
  • Set the ordering as the identifier when translating VALUES #33436
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fixes around identifier and type mappings for ValuesExpression #33439

Updated

  • Introduce liftable constants to shaper to prepare for precompilation #33351
